meanings.definition: The quality or state of being insatiable.
meanings.sent1: Her insatiablenesses for knowledge led her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent2: His insatiablenesses for sweets always left him wanting more.
meanings.sent3: The insatiablenesses of the puppy for treats was both adorable and endless.
meanings.sent4: The insatiablenesses of the ocean for ships is a dangerous hunger.
meanings.sent5: The insatiablenesses of the child for toys knew no bounds.

meanings.definition: The condition of never being satisfied or fulfilled.
meanings.sent1: The insatiablenesses of his ambition drove him to work tirelessly towards his goals.
meanings.sent2: The insatiablenesses of her desire for success kept her pushing forward despite obstacles.
meanings.sent3: The insatiablenesses of the cat for attention was both amusing and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: The insatiablenesses of time for moments slipped away too quickly.
meanings.sent5: The insatiablenesses of the fire for fuel consumed everything in its path.
